name: Golden Compass Program
description: Multidisciplinary medical care and social support for eligible 50+ individuals living with HIV. HIV positive patients and HIV-negative patients who would like to start PrEP.
fullDescription: Multidisciplinary medical care and social support for eligible 50+ individuals living with HIV. HIV positive patients and HIV-negative patients who would like to start PrEP.
whatTheyOffer: Multidisciplinary medical care and social support for eligible 50+ individuals living with HIV. HIV positive patients and HIV-negative patients who would like to start PrEP.
howToGetIt: For more information or to contribute to this initiative, contact goldencompass@ucsf.edu or (415) 206-2473.
